description: It's nighttime at the ranch in Dry Gulch Desert, and the cows are falling asleep. Dot thinks that the sleeping cows would be more comfortable on their side. Help Dot share this "tip" with the cows.

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on white lights. Then make Dot automatically show a pattern in the eye ring.
puzzles.introduction:
Dot needs a costume to sneak up on the sleeping cows.  
Let's make Dot white with spots!

hints.description: Drag out a White light and an Eye Ring. Create a pattern in the eye ring to give Dot spots. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After the eye ring, make Dot play the cow sound when tilted to lean left. Then make Dot return to Start when tilted upright.

hints.description: Drag out an Animals sound. Set the sound to Cow. Link the Eye Ring to the sound using a Lean Left cue. Link the sound to Start using an Upright cue.

puzzles.description: After the eye ring, make Dot play the cow sound when Dot is tilted face up, or face down, or when tilted to lean right.
puzzles.introduction:
Hmmm.  The cow didn't seem too happy.  
Dot thinks we should try tipping them on different sides.

hints.description: Add more links between the Eye Ring and the Cow sound. Use the Lean Right, Face Up and Face Down cues.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot give the cows a good night's sleep. Roll Dot on the floor until Dot tips three cows.
puzzles.introduction: Hehe.  Looks like Dot isn't giving up until those cows get a good night's sleep!
